FROM TB_HDA_CMM_BOARD t1
(CB_TYPE = '0101' or CB_TYPE = '0102') CB_TYPE = '0101' CB_TYPE = '0102' CB_TYPE = '0201' CB_TYPE = '0301' CB_TYPE = '0401' CB_TYPE = '0501' CB_TYPE = '0601' CB_TYPE = '0602' CB_TYPE = '0603' CB_TYPE = '0610' CB_TYPE = '0611' CB_TYPE = '0604' CB_TYPE = '0605' CB_TYPE = '0701' CB_TYPE = '0801' CB_TYPE = '0901' CB_TYPE = '0902' CB_TYPE = '1001' CB_TYPE = '1101' CB_TYPE = '1201'
CB_TITLE like concat('%', #searchWord#, '%')
REG_NAME like concat('%', #searchWord#, '%')
CB_NOTICE_YN = #searchType#

/* AdmCmmBoardDAO.selectCmmBoardList */
SELECT CB_SEQ , CB_NAME , REG_SEQ , REG_NAME , CB_TITLE , CB_CONTENT , DATE_FORMAT(CB_REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as CB_REG_DATE , CB_COUNT , CB_NOTICE_YN , CB_SECRET_YN , CB_PASSWORD , CB_TYPE , CB_TH_TYPE , CB_TH_IMG_NAME , CB_TH_IMG_PATH , CB_TH_URL , CB_CONTENT_REPLY , CB_CONREPLY_NAME , CB_CONREPLY_DATE , CB_GUBUN
, (SELECT count(*) FROM TB_HDA_CB_COMMENT WHERE CB_SEQ = tt.CB_SEQ) as CMMT_COUNT from ( SELECT CB_SEQ , CB_NAME , REG_SEQ , REG_NAME , CB_TITLE , CB_CONTENT , CB_REG_DATE , CB_COUNT , CB_NOTICE_YN , CB_SECRET_YN , CB_PASSWORD , CB_TYPE , CB_TH_TYPE , CB_TH_IMG_NAME , CB_TH_IMG_PATH , CB_TH_URL , CB_CONTENT_REPLY , CB_CONREPLY_NAME , CB_CONREPLY_DATE , CB_GUBUN
ORDER BY
CB_NOTICE_YN desc, CB_NOTICE_DATE = '' asc, CB_NOTICE_DATE desc,
CB_NOTICE_YN desc, CB_NOTICE_DATE = '' asc, CB_NOTICE_DATE desc,
CB_NOTICE_YN desc, CB_NOTICE_DATE = '' asc, CB_NOTICE_DATE desc,
CB_REG_DATE desc
LIMIT #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#
) tt

/* AdmCmmBoardDAO.selectCmmBoardOne */
SELECT CB_SEQ as cbSeq , CB_NAME as cbName , REG_SEQ as regSeq , REG_NAME as regName , CB_TITLE as cbTitle , CB_CONTENT as cbContent , DATE_FORMAT(CB_REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as cbRegDate , CB_COUNT as cbCount , CB_NOTICE_YN as cbNoticeYn , CB_SECRET_YN as cbSecretYn , CB_PASSWORD as cbPassword , CB_TYPE as cbType , CB_TH_TYPE as cbThType , CB_TH_IMG_NAME as cbThImgName , CB_TH_IMG_PATH as cbThImgPath , CB_TH_URL as cbThUrl , CB_CONTENT_REPLY as cbContentReply , CB_CONREPLY_NAME as cbConReplyName , CB_CONREPLY_DATE as cbConReplyDate , DATE_FORMAT(CB_NOTICE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') as cbNoticeDate , CB_GUBUN as cbGubun FROM TB_HDA_CMM_BOARD WHERE CB_SEQ = #cbSeq#

, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
, #cmmBoardVO.cbThType# , #cmmBoardVO.cbThUrl# , #cmmBoardVO.cbPassword# , #cmmBoardVO.cbGubun# )
